code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{supabase}from'../supabaseClient';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function LoginPage(){const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const[error,setError]=useState('');const[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);const handleLogin=async e=>{e.preventDefault();setLoading(true);setError('');const{error}=await supabase.auth.signInWithPassword({email,password});if(error){setError(error.message);}else{window.location.href='/';}setLoading(false);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{maxWidth:400,margin:'auto',padding:32},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Entrar no Sistema"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleLogin,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",placeholder:"E-mail",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value),required:true,style:{width:'100%',marginBottom:12}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",placeholder:"Senha",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),required:true,style:{width:'100%',marginBottom:12}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",disabled:loading,style:{width:'100%'},children:loading?'Entrando...':'Entrar'}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{color:'red',marginTop:8},children:error})]})]});}export default LoginPage;
